notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: F.O.-S., computer analysis; V.V.-E., plant collection and extract purification; A.M.-O., plant species identification; M.R.-C., anti-proliferative activity; G.A.-G., data analysis; E.A.-E., anti-proliferative activity; G.R.; phytochemical screening, writing, revision. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
